content.text:
# List of awards and nominations received by Vicky Kaushal

Vicky Kaushal is an Indian actor who appears in Hindi films. He has appeared in Forbes India Celebrity 100 list of 2019. Kaushal is the recipient of 28 accolades into his credit. He won three IIFA Awards one Best Debut Actor for Masaan (2016), Best Supporting Actor for Sanju (2019) and Best Actor for Sardar Udham (2022). He received the Best Actor at the 66th National Film Awards for Uri: The Surgical Strike. Kaushal won the Filmfare Award for Best Supporting Actor for Sanju and Best Actor (Critics) for Sardar Udham.
